name: Crop Busters HD (Free)
description:
Bring out your inner farmer in Crop Busters, an unbelievably addicting new match-three adventure game! Scarlett is excited as she returns to her grandmother's farm for the first time since she was a child, but her dreams of a perfect homecoming are shattered when she discovers the wonderful farm of her youth has lost all of its previous luster. You must help Scarlett on her quest to return the farm to its former glory, and bring back the wonderful memories of times past!

Tap the screen and drag across crops to create matches, fill up trucks with loads of produce before time runs out, and fix up your farm with one dazzling upgrade after the other! Buy pets to help with chores, use bonuses to win, and earn trophies for amazing feats as you plow through 100 breathtaking levels. Can you turn one of the most barren patches of dirt into one of the most fertile plots of land in the heartland? Find out today in Crop Busters!

GAME FEATURES:
◇ 100 crop-busting levels!
◇ Four hilarious animal friends!
◇ Build your own personal farm!
◇ Hints and tips to help along the way!
◇ Tutorial to ease you into the gameplay!
